## Our Areas of Expertise
Empowering businesses with Cutting-Edge Technology Solutions. From custom software development to artificial intelligence and blockchain, we offer a comprehensive range of services to help our clients stay ahead in the digital age.
Software Development Services
Providing comprehensive IT consulting, modernization, development, and maintenance service for businesses:
  * IT Assessment and Modernization
  * Software Development
  * New Technology Development
  * Offshore Development Center
  * Digital Transformation Consultancy

[View Details ](https://ntq.com.vn/service/)

  * Partnership and Joint Venture
  * Technology Platform Integration
  * Software Solution Development

  * Digitalization (Scan, Index, DTP, etc)

## NTQ Solution at a glance
With over 14 years of experience in developing ICT solutions and providing global customer support, NTQ Solution is committed to delivering quality excellence and have a strong foundation built on unparalleled customer satisfaction.
[ Learn more Who we are ](https://ntq.com.vn/company/who-we-are/)
  * Our employee 1300+ Global & local workforce
  * Engineering excellence 760+ Successful projects
  * Engineering excellence 350+ Global Clients
  * Development 20+ Solutions & Products Launched
  * Global operation 5 Global branches
  * Quality Focus 30 Industries covered


## Proud to be trusted by global clients
Strict commitment to deliver High-quality service - WOW experiences is one of our core business philosophies. Satisfaction and happiness of our Clients are the main foundation that contributes to NTQ’s prosperity.
Not only precisely implemented the detailed design, but NTQ Solution also can correspond to the rough specifications while considering the convenience in product manipulation.
NTQ Solution is our trusted long-term partner, who has outstanding ability in delivering high-technology; managing and developing LABO; providing the new technology; and corresponding promptly to the arising problems.
Mr. Takeyama Kazuyuki, Manager Systena Corporation, Japan
We are really amazed by the outstanding capability, language skills, and analytical thinking of NTQ Korea’s team throughout the project. They demonstrated a quality that exceeds our expectations, which is truly equivalent to what Korean experts can do.
Mr. Park Juno, Director Studio 3S, Korea
The NTQ team members are very positive, focused and hardworking. Despite time difference and Covid-19 the team has supported us well during our business hours. It’s been a learning curve from both sides with language as a challenge. Understanding of our needs and issue has improved and overall we receive good quality solutions. Personal relationships matter to us and as we plan to continue working together with NTQ we hope to meet one or more NTQ team members in the future.
Client, World's L

needs and issue has improved and overall we receive good quality solutions. Personal relationships matter to us and as we plan to continue working together with NTQ we hope to meet one or more NTQ team members in the future.
Client, World's Largest International Shipping Association
## Customer Success Stories
See how we create 360° Value to encourage Clients to become the better versions of themselves.
[ Meet our Clients ](https://ntq.com.vn/case-studies/)
BFSI MBAL Digital Transformation Logistics Studio 3S – Smart Warehouse Esports GDC for Golf Simulator  Manufacturing Global System Upgrade  BFSI MBAL Digital Transformation  Logistics Studio 3S – Smart Warehouse  Esports GDC for Golf Simulator  Manufacturing Global System Upgrade 
### Global System Upgrade
How NTQ facilitated secure and efficient system migration, enhancing performance and security for our client's seamless global expansion.
[ View Details ](https://ntq.com.vn/case-studies/)
### MBAL Digital Transformation
How we helped MBAL succeed by revolutionizing customer experience, supercharging sales, and streamlining operations through a comprehensive digital transformation.
[ View Details ](https://ntq.com.vn/case_study/leverage-sales-management-process-for-a-leading-insurance-firm/)
### Studio 3S – Smart Warehouse
Smart Warehouse is a game-changing logistics and warehouse management software through an integrated system, leveraging advanced technology and smart solutions.
[ View Details ](https://ntq.com.vn/case-studies/)
### GDC for Golf Simulator
Golf Simulator System is a collaborative project with a South Korean esports company, innovating global esports business models and addressing HR challenges.
[ View Details ](https://ntq.com.vn/case-studies/)
## Our Commitment
### Delivering World-Class Products & Services
Our goal is to deliver world-class products and services that exceed our clients' expectations in every way possible. We take pride in providing innovative solutions that help our clients achieve their goals. We never compromise on quality and use the latest technologies and best practices to ensure that our products and services are of the highest standard.
Pham Thai Son CEO, NTQ Solution
## Join our team
NTQ is a home for young technology talents to build a strong "One-team", empowering them to reach international markets

our products and services are of the highest standard.
Pham Thai Son CEO, NTQ Solution
## Join our team
NTQ is a home for young technology talents to build a strong "One-team", empowering them to reach international markets.
Everything we do revolves around people. We help our employees "find their spark" by offering them the freedom and flexibility to grow and create a diverse, collaborative, and open environment at NTQ.
